song_name: Single For The Rest Of My Life
lyrics:
Oh... oh...
Oh, yeah, yeah, oh, yeah 
Ooh, ooh
Oh, yeah, yeah

Sittin' here
Daydreamin' about you
or everything we had
Wish I can get it back

Cause if it aint you, then I dont want it
And if it aint you, then it aint for me
I can see your face whenever I be sleepin'
But it hurts me when I realize I'm dreamin'

So if I can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
Cause you can't be replaced by nobody else
I'll go crazy if i can't have you for myself

If i can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
I've decided that nobody can compare to you
Theres nobody that can make me feel the way you do

There's been a few
who've tried to take your place
I've been on many dates
But still it just aint the same

Cause if it's not a letter sent from you, then i dont read it
If it's not a gift from sent from you, then i dont need it
I've been longin' just to find somebody like you
But nobody can do it quite like you (If I) 

So if I can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
Cause you can't be replaced my nobody else
I'll go crazy if I can't have you for myself 

If I can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
I've decided that nobody can compare to you
There's nobody that can make me feel the way you do

I took your pictures off the wall
That didn't seem to help at all
So imma put it out there, imma let you know
If you need to rest your head, you can make back home

I thought that I can live without your love, though I tried
But I feel incomplete if I don't have you in my life
So imma put it out there, imma let you know
If you need to rest your head, you can come back home

So if I can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
Cause you can't be replaced my nobody else
I'll go crazy if I can't have you for myself

If I can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
I've decided that nobody can compare to you
There's nobody that can make me feel the way you do

So if I can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
Cause you can't be replaced my nobody else
I'll go crazy if I cant have you for myself

If i can't have you
I'll just be single for the rest of my life
I've decided that nobody can compare to you
Theres nobody that can make me feel the way you do

Nobody can make me feel the way you do
